title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 and other LLMs locally with a single CLI, Docker-style API and built-in model registry.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama gives synchronous and async generators for chat & generate endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or chat backend with LangChain primitives.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG and user management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, pull and list with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cody
summary: Sourcegraph Cody plugin that can point to local Ollama models for code chat and autocomplete.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama sidecars in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/generate inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library for Ollama with GenServer behavior and Telemetry events.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and structured streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.
